# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional and worth every penny of its $80 value to you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I propose we make this transaction even more appealing by offering it to you at an exclusive introductory price of $75. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a top-tier item at a slight discount, ensuring you get the most out of your investment. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
